item.title: A Very Special Birthday and an investment choice forever
item.description: In this special episode, Paul Merriman reflects on six decades of financial evolution, sparked by his son's 60th birthday. He draws fascinating comparisons between life and investing in 1965 and today, offering invaluable insights for every investor... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/10bb8090/podcast/rss

item.title: 1984 Was A Warning - Part Two
item.description: What if everything you’ve ever been taught... was a lie?For tens of thousands of years, humanity has been caught in the grip of a master deception — a grand illusion carefully woven by an elite few who believe they are destined to rule. Through the falsification of history, control of knowledge, and the manipulation of minds, they have shaped our reality... and kept the truth buried... Feed: https://rss.amperwave.net/v2/feed/podcorn/305c38e16dc14113698bedc4b8d3cfaa
